member.name: T:BinCalc.BCalc
member.summary: Class BCalc for binary operation for integers

member.name: M:BinCalc.BCalc.DoBinOperation(System.String)
member.summary: Method calculate binary operation: or, and, xor

example.code: string s = BCalc.DoBinOperation("23|4");// s = "23" string s = BCalc.DoBinOperation("23^4");// s = "19"
